column4: how do I turn on network discovery? There are machines on the network that I can't see and they can't see me either
I'm the only one on Linux
I can see one other computer, that's it
all your computers - linux or some windows, mac .....
I reckon it could be something to do with workgroup settings on the windows machine but I dunno
well, know anything about an easy way to turn network discovery on/off?
googling it gives me loads of stuff about installing random crap
tbh there should be something that comes with ubuntu
it seems like a basic thing
My netbook sees all my machines, have you tried ssh?
I believe that works with windows
